sentences.english: I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
sentences.chinese: 我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。

sentences.english: I tasted the paste in haste and cast it on the waste plaster.
sentences.chinese: 我匆仓促品味了浆糊然后将其丢在废泥灰上。

sentences.english: But your list does not include wetlands and peatlands.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你所列出的并没有包括沼泽湿地和泥灰地。

sentences.english: A thick porous chalk subsoil covered with marl, clay or sand.
sentences.chinese: 粗稠的，上面盖有泥灰，沙砾和粘土的底层土。

sentences.english: The houses were iced over with multicolored stuccoes.
sentences.chinese: 那些房子涂着五颜六色的泥灰。

sentences.english: This is a research on using marl and tailings from copper are and zinc ore to produce low energy consumption cement.
sentences.chinese: 研究利用泥灰岩和铜锌尾矿代粘土烧制水泥熟料。

sentences.english: I barely got my hands up in time to keep my face from slamming nose-first into the plaster.
sentences.chinese: 我只来得及抬手免得连脸也和鼻子一样撞到泥灰墙里。

sentences.english: Tearing away the wallpaper, he found the plastered wall underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他撕掉墙纸，发现里面是泥灰墙。

sentences.english: In the one bathroom house made of plaster and stone.
sentences.chinese: 睡在用泥灰与石头盖成的单人卧房中。
